# AstraHR
> The AI-native HR platform for High-Performance Teams.

## Documentation
- [Home](https://astrahr.com/): The landing page and overview.

## Core Concepts
- **AI-First**: AstraHR is built from the ground up with LLMs to automate HR workflows.
- **People Operations**: Streamline onboarding, offboarding, and performance reviews.
- **Analytics**: Real-time insights into workforce dynamics.

## Technical Details
- Built with Next.js 16 and Tailwind CSS.
